verses.verse: How <WH4100> hast thou helped <WH5826> him that is without <WH3808> power? <WH3581> how savest <WH3467> thou the arm <WH2220> that hath no <WH3808> strength? <WH5797>
How <WH4100> hast thou counseled <WH3289> him that hath no <WH3808> wisdom? <WH2451> and how hast thou plentifully <WH7230> declared <WH3045> the thing <WH8454> as it is?
To <WH854> whom <WH4310> hast thou uttered <WH5046> words? <WH4405> and whose <WH4310> spirit <WH5397> came <WH3318> from <WH4480> thee?
Dead <WH7496> things are formed <WH2342> from under <WH4480> <WH8478> the waters, <WH4325> and the inhabitants <WH7931> thereof.
Hell <WH7585> is naked <WH6174> before <WH5048> him, and destruction <WH11> hath no <WH369> covering. <WH3682>
He stretcheth out <WH5186> the north <WH6828> over <WH5921> the empty place, <WH8414> and hangeth <WH8518> the earth <WH776> upon <WH5921> nothing. <WH1099>
He bindeth up <WH6887> the waters <WH4325> in his thick clouds; <WH5645> and the cloud <WH6051> is not rent <WH1234> <WH3808> under <WH8478> them.
He holdeth back <WH270> the face <WH6440> of his throne, <WH3678> and spreadeth <WH6576> his cloud <WH6051> upon <WH5921> it.
He hath compassed <WH2328> <WH5921> the waters <WH6440> <WH4325> with bounds, <WH2706> until <WH5704> the day <WH216> and night <WH2822> come to an end. <WH8503>
The pillars <WH5982> of heaven <WH8064> tremble <WH7322> and are astonished <WH8539> at his reproof. <WH4480> <WH1606>
He divideth <WH7280> the sea <WH3220> with his power, <WH3581> and by his understanding <WH8394> he smiteth through <WH4272> the proud. <WH7293>
By his spirit <WH7307> he hath garnished <WH8235> the heavens; <WH8064> his hand <WH3027> hath formed <WH2490> the crooked <WH1281> serpent. <WH5175>

Lo, <WH2005> these <WH428> are parts <WH7098> of his ways: <WH1870> but how <WH4100> little <WH8102> a portion <WH1697> is heard <WH8085> of him? but the thunder <WH7482> of his power <WH1369> who <WH4310> can understand? <WH995>
